TAXONOMIC CLASS.content: TAXONOMIC CLASS: Fine, smectitic, thermic Typic Albaqualfs

USE AND VEGETATION.content: RANGE IN CHARACTERISTICS:  The A1 horizon ranges in thickness from 1 to 4 inches; the content of lime in the B3ca is quite variable, and the pH of the subsoil may be mildly or moderately alkaline.  The underlying material is variable in texture from sandy loam to sandy clay loam.
